title: I can't find this typeface... please help
content:
Hello fellow typophiles,

I am trying to get a name on this font, found on a logo; the closest match i have found is Worcest round bold, but it’s not exactly this one, though it obviously comes from the same era.

Any idea?

dr

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Photo 23.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203232446/http:/typophile.com/files/Photo%2023_0.jpg) | 47.16 KB |

 [‹ Easy one I should imagine - London Zoo Penguin Pool](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203232446/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41797 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Beautiful italic sans on J Kaczmarek website - Omnes {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203232446/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41753 "Go to next forum topic")
author: David R

comments.content:
That’s the Heineken logotype by Earik Wiersma and Lucas de Groot. Someone made a free font out of it on dafont.

[http://books.google.com/books?id=sR9g5xPPJVQC&pg=PA308&lpg=PA308&dq=%22E...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203232446/http:/books.google.com/books?id=sR9g5xPPJVQC&pg=PA308&lpg=PA308&dq=%22Earik+Wiersma%22+heinekan&source=web&ots=V4l68cBtyE&sig=AnvjGkdh4fVaDfNYqBFl9awFgFM "http://books.google.com/books?id=sR9g5xPPJVQC&pg=PA308&lpg=PA308&dq=%22Earik+Wiersma%22+heinekan&source=web&ots=V4l68cBtyE&sig=AnvjGkdh4fVaDfNYqBFl9awFgFM")

many thanks, folks. i’d drink a beer on that, if i was drinking alcohol.

dr
